definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: In all our work we must persevere in the Anti-Japanese National United Front as the general policy.
sentences.chinese: 在一切工作中，應該堅持抗日民族統一戰線的總方針。

sentences.english: The fundamental "open-up" policy should be persevered throughout.
sentences.chinese: 我們要堅持改革開放的總方針。

sentences.english: Under that general policy, research on the atomic bomb was begun.
sentences.chinese: 在這一總方針的指導下，原子彈方面的研究開始了。

sentences.english: Military plans on these lines must be made, in keeping with the general policy of resolute armed resistance.
sentences.chinese: 按照堅決抗戰的總方針，必須作如上各項的軍事計劃。

sentences.english: The committee are busy laying down a general policy.
sentences.chinese: 委員會正忙於制定一個總方針。

sentences.english: The society synthesis governing is general policy of our country to solve the social question.
sentences.chinese: 社會綜合治理是我國解決社會治安問題的總方針。
